text: Gerled is an unincorporated community in Kossuth County, in the U.S. state of Iowa. ==History== Gerled was named by conjoining the names of two adjacent townships: German and Ledyard. A post office was established at Gerled in 1902, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1951. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Kossuth County, Iowa Category:1902 establishments in Iowa Category:Populated places established in 1902 Category:Unincorporated communities in Iowa
title: Gerled, Iowa
